Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~andrew-coleman Sounds like this one is happening frequently (timeout at different locations), can you take a look?

Action.author: mbwhite
Action.body: Looking at this I would concur that this is a timing issue... the chaincode just isn't ready yet.Â

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: ~vijaypunugubati we believe Simon's latest commits have at least fixed the node sdk merge builds - can you let us know if this fixes the fabric end-2-end tests too?

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Ah ok, not good to hear you've hit something new - as it's a different error to this one, could you raise a separate issue please? I'm going to close this one.
